group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser
Class FileChooserActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.FileChooserActivity

public class FileChooserActivity
extends Activity

Main activity for this library.

Notes:

I. About keys _Rootpath, _SelectFile and preference DisplayPrefs.isRememberLastLocation(Context), the priorities of them are:

  • 1. _SelectFile
  • 2. DisplayPrefs.isRememberLastLocation(Context)
  • 3. _Rootpath

    • Author:
    Hai Bison

              The full name of this class.
    static String _DefaultFilename
              Key to hold default filename, default = null
    static String _DisplayHiddenFiles
              Key to hold display-hidden-files, default = false
    static String _DoubleTapToChooseFiles
              Sets this to true to enable double tapping to choose files/ directories.
    static String _FileProviderClass
              Key to hold the service class which implements IFileProvider.
    Default is LocalFileProvider
    static String _FilterMode
              Key to hold IFileProvider.FilterMode, default is IFileProvider.FilterMode#FilesOnly.
    static String _MaxFileCount
              Key to hold max file count that's allowed to be listed, default = 1024
    static String _MultiSelection
              Key to hold multi-selection mode, default = false
    static String _RegexFilenameFilter
              Key to hold regex filename filter, default = null
    static String _Results
              Key to hold results (can be one or multiple files)
    static String _Rootpath
              Key to hold the root path.

    If LocalFileProvider is used, then default is sdcard, if sdcard is not available, "/" will be used.

    Note: The value of this key is a IFile
    static String _SaveDialog
              Key to hold property save-dialog, default = false

              Sets the file you want to select when starting this activity.

    Default is:
    R.style for SDK >= Build.VERSION_CODES#ICE_CREAM_SANDWICH R.style for SDK >= Build.VERSION_CODES#HONEYCOMB R.style for older systems

    Field Detail

    _ClassName

    public static final String _ClassName
    The full name of this class. Generally used for debugging.

    _Theme

    public static final String _Theme
    Sets value of this key to a theme in android.R.style.Theme_*.
    Default is:
  • R.style for SDK >= Build.VERSION_CODES#ICE_CREAM_SANDWICH
  • R.style for SDK >= Build.VERSION_CODES#HONEYCOMB
  • R.style for older systems

    • Since:
    v4.3 beta

    _Rootpath

    public static final String _Rootpath
    Key to hold the root path.

    If LocalFileProvider is used, then default is sdcard, if sdcard is not available, "/" will be used.

    Note: The value of this key is a IFile

    _FileProviderClass

    public static final String _FileProviderClass
    Key to hold the service class which implements IFileProvider.
    Default is LocalFileProvider

    _FilterMode

    public static final String _FilterMode
    Key to hold IFileProvider.FilterMode, default is IFileProvider.FilterMode#FilesOnly.

    _MaxFileCount

    public static final String _MaxFileCount
    Key to hold max file count that's allowed to be listed, default = 1024

    _MultiSelection

    public static final String _MultiSelection
    Key to hold multi-selection mode, default = false

    _RegexFilenameFilter

    public static final String _RegexFilenameFilter
    Key to hold regex filename filter, default = null

    _DisplayHiddenFiles

    public static final String _DisplayHiddenFiles
    Key to hold display-hidden-files, default = false

    _DoubleTapToChooseFiles

    public static final String _DoubleTapToChooseFiles
    Sets this to true to enable double tapping to choose files/ directories. In older versions, double tapping is default. However, since v4.7 beta, single tapping is default. So if you want to keep the old way, please set this key to true.

    Since:
    v4.7 beta

    _SelectFile

    public static final String _SelectFile
    Sets the file you want to select when starting this activity. The file is an IFile.
    Notes:
  • Currently this key is only used for single selection mode.
  • If you use save dialog mode, this key will override key _DefaultFilename.

    • Since:
    v4.7 beta

    _SaveDialog

    public static final String _SaveDialog
    Key to hold property save-dialog, default = false

    _DefaultFilename

    public static final String _DefaultFilename
    Key to hold default filename, default = null

    _Results

    public static final String _Results
    Key to hold results (can be one or multiple files)

    public FileChooserActivity()
